verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of the passover <S%G3957><s%>, when Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5754><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he should depart <S%G3327><s%> <S%G5632><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, having loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5660><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, he loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> being ended <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%>, the devil <S%G1228><s%> having now <S%G2235><s%> put <S%G906><s%> <S%G5761><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> of K'riot <S%G2469><s%>, SHim`on's <S%G4613><s%> son, to <S%G2443><s%> betray <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5632><s%> him <S%G846><s%>;

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> had given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5758><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was come <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> from <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>;

He riseht <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5743><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> laid aside <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5719><s%> his garments <S%G2440><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> a towel <S%G3012><s%>, and girded <S%G1241><s%> <S%G5656><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>.

After that <S%G1534><s%> he poureth <S%G906><s%> <S%G5719><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a bason <S%G3537><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> <S%G5662><s%> to wash <S%G3538><s%> <S%G5721><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>' feet <S%G4228><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to wipe <S%G1591><s%> <S%G5721><s%> them with the towel <S%G3012><s%> wherewith <S%G3739><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> girded <S%G1241><s%> <S%G5772><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, What <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> now <S%G737><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> thou shalt know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5695><s%> hereafter <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%>.

SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> my hands <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my head <S%G2776><s%>.

So <S%G3767><s%> after <S%G3753><s%> he had washed <S%G3538><s%> <S%G5656><s%> their <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had taken <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5627><s%> his <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%>, and was set down <S%G377><s%> <S%G5631><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Know ye <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5719><s%> <S%G5720><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> I have done <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5758><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>?

If <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>, your YY <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%>, have washed <S%G3538><s%> <S%G5656><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>; ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to wash <S%G3538><s%> <S%G5721><s%> one another's <S%G240><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, The servant <S%G1401><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> his <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>; neither <S%G3761><s%> he that is sent <S%G652><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> he that sent <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5660><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

I speak <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>: I <S%G1473><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have chosen <S%G1586><s%> <S%G5668><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> may be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, He that eateth <S%G5176><s%> <S%G5723><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> hath lifted up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heel <S%G4418><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, He that receiveth <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5723><s%> whomsoever <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5100><s%> I send <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5661><s%> receiveth <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> he that receiveth <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5723><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> receiveth <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him that sent <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5660><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

When Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> had <S%G2036><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, he was troubled <S%G5015><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> testified <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> shall betray <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5692><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> looked <S%G991><s%> <S%G5707><s%> one on another <S%G1519><s%> <S%G240><s%>, doubting <S%G639><s%> <S%G5734><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> he spake <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> leaning <S%G345><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>' bosom <S%G2859><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5707><s%>.

SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> beckoned <S%G3506><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to him <S%G5129><s%>, that he should ask <S%G4441><s%> <S%G5635><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> it should <S%G302><s%> be <S%G1498><s%> <S%G5751><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he spake <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, He <S%G1565><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, to whom <S%G3739><s%> I shall give <S%G1929><s%> <S%G5692><s%> a sop <S%G5596><s%>, when I <S%G1473><s%> have dipped <S%G911><s%> <S%G5660><s%> it. And <S%G2532><s%> when he had dipped <S%G1686><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the sop <S%G5596><s%>, he gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5719><s%> it to Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> of K'riot <S%G2469><s%>, the son of SHim`on <S%G4613><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the sop <S%G5596><s%> <S%G5119><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G1565><s%>. Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, That <S%G3739><s%> thou doest <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5657><s%> quickly <S%G5032><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> at the table <S%G345><s%> <S%G5740><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5627><s%> for what <S%G4314><s%> intent <S%G5101><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them thought <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, because <S%G1893><s%> Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the bag <S%G1101><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> had said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Buy <S%G59><s%> <S%G5657><s%> those things that <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> need of <S%G5532><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%>; or <S%G2228><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he should give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5632><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%>.

He <S%G1565><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the sop <S%G5596><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> night <S%G3571><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> he was gone out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, Now <S%G3568><s%> is <S%G1392><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> be glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> shall <S%G1392><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5692><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G1392><s%> straightway <S%G2117><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5692><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

A new <S%G2537><s%> Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, That <S%G2443><s%> ye love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5725><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>; as <S%G2531><s%> I have loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5656><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5725><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>.

By <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> shall <S%G1097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5695><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5725><s%> love <S%G26><s%> one to another <S%G1722><s%> <S%G240><s%>.

SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, whither <S%G4226><s%> goest <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thou? Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Whither <S%G3699><s%> I go <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, thou canst <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> <S%G5658><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> now <S%G3568><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> thou shalt follow <S%G190><s%> <S%G5692><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> afterwards <S%G5305><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Wilt thou lay down <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> my sake <S%G1700><s%>? Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, The cock <S%G220><s%> shall <S%G5455><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> crow <S%G5455><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou hast denied <S%G533><s%> <S%G5695><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> thrice <S%G5151><s%>.
